tiers.description: Minor Shove: Push 1 target 1m. (Contested Might check).
Repel Step: Push self 2m in any direction.
Precision Trip: Force target to pass Agility check or be Prone.
Blast Wave: Push all targets in a 2m radius 2m back.
Weapon Disarm: Force target to drop weapon (Contested Might vs. Strength check).
Anchor: Hold one target stationary for 1 round (Willpower check to break free).
Group Containment: Push all targets in a 5m cone 4m back.
Crush Limb: Apply kinetic pressure to one limb, inflicting the Hinder status for 2 rounds.
Telekinetic Lock: Immobilize 1 target completely for 2 rounds (major Presence cost).
Concussive Strike: Standard attack deals 1d4 extra non-lethal damage.
Armor Shock: Attack treats target's armor as −1 tier weaker.
Shockwave Cone: Deal 1d6 AoE damage to all targets in a 3m cone.
Solid Impact: Guaranteed Solid Hit (Stagger) if the attack succeeds.
Internal Echo: Deal 2d6 damage directly to the target's HP (ignoring outer armor).
Precision Burst: Target suffers a Minor Injury on a successful strike (once per encounter).
Concussive Focus: Attack ignores T2 armor completely and inflicts 3d6 damage.
Terrain Rupture: Destroy a piece of terrain/cover (T3 material resistance or lower).
Full Force Cataclysm: Strike deals massive 5d6 damage and forces target to pass a Vitality check or be instantly Prone.
Quick Leap: Increase jump distance/height by 100% for one turn.
Light Step: Ignore T1 movement penalties (e.g., shallow water, rough ground).
Velocity Boost: Target an ally; grant a bonus to their next Movement roll.
Kinetic Shield: Absorb 1 incoming point of physical damage per character level.
Barrier Dash: Move up to 10m through hostile terrain or crowds without penalty.
Group Mobility: Target 2 allies; grant them +3m movement for 2 rounds.
Hover Field: Float 1m off the ground for 5 rounds, ignoring all ground-based penalties.
Juggernaut Advance: Grants immunity to Prone and Staggered status effects for 3 rounds.
Nullify Gravity: Target an ally; reduce their weight to zero for 2 turns (massively boosting movement and attack rolls).
Taunt: Force 1 enemy to target you (Willpower save DC 10).
Threat Zone: All enemies leaving a 2m radius around you provoke an attack of opportunity.
Anchor Ally: Redirect the next single attack aimed at an adjacent ally to yourself.
Mass Taunt: Force all enemies in a 3m radius to target you (Willpower save DC 12).
Defensive Bind: Hold one enemy in place for 2 rounds (Contested Endurance check).
Area Denial: Create a 4m field; enemies attempting to enter suffer a movement penalty.
Immovable Object: Become immune to all forced movement (e.g., Shove, Blast Wave) for 3 rounds.
Ally Anchor: Redirect all attacks aimed at one designated ally to yourself for 2 rounds.
Absolute Rebuke: Create an AoE 6m field. Any enemy attempting to leave the field suffers Major Composure damage.
Minor Reflect: When hit by Melee, inflict 1d4 damage back.
Spiked Deflection: Successfully block an attack; inflict damage equal to 25% of the original attack's damage.
Retaliatory Stun: Successfully block a Melee attack; automatically inflict the Staggered status on the attacker.
Reactive Guard: After taking damage, your next attack deals bonus damage equal to the damage absorbed.
Shield Crash: Successfully block an attack; the attacker must pass a Vitality check or be knocked Prone.
Full Feedback: Successfully block an attack; inflict damage equal to 50% of the original attack's base damage back to the attacker.
Absolute Deflect: Successfully block a ranged attack; redirect the attack at another target within range.
Vengeful Aura: Any enemy that successfully deals damage to you suffers 2d6 direct damage immediately.
Damage Nullification: Completely absorb the damage from the next 2 incoming attacks and add it to your own next attack's damage roll.
Self-Repair: Restore 1d6 HP to yourself.
Reinforce Armor: Increase the defense rating of your Plate or Chainmail armor by +1 for 3 rounds.
Shield Ally: Grant an adjacent ally +2 Defense for 1 round.
AoE Defense: All allies in a 3m radius gain +1 Defense for 2 rounds.
Resist Status: Grant an adjacent ally immunity to T1 status effects (e.g., Minor Poison) for 3 rounds.
Energy Dampener: Grant yourself +3 resistance against 1 chosen elemental damage type for 3 rounds.
Aegis Wall: Create a 5m force wall that grants +3 defense to all allies behind it.
Absolute Immunity: Grant an adjacent ally immunity to the next 2 instances of physical damage.
Full Barrier: Grant yourself or an adjacent ally complete immunity to all damage for the duration of the next 2 attacks aimed at them.
Stifle Movement: Impose a −1 penalty on target's next Movement roll.
Weakened Attack: Impose a −2 penalty on target's next attack roll.
Pressure Stun: Hit target; impose the Staggered status effect.
Nerve Pinch: Hit target; impose the Hinder status on one limb (e.g., Arm or Leg) for 2 rounds.
AP Drain: Hit target; force them to spend 1 extra AP on their next action.
Muscle Spasm: Target suffers the Hinder status on their legs for 3 rounds (Halved Movement).
Vital Lock: Immobilize target completely for 2 rounds (Willpower save DC 15 to resist).
Sensory Shutoff: Blind or Deaf target for 3 rounds (Contested Fortitude check).
Organ Cessation: Shut down a non-vital system in target (e.g., speech, non-essential limb movement) for the remainder of the encounter.
Clean Strike: Attack deals 1d4 extra damage.
Armor Flicker: Attack treats target's armor as −2 tiers weaker.
Ghost Strike: Next Unarmed attack ignores T1 armor completely.
Internal Shock: Deal 2d6 damage directly to HP (ignoring outer armor).
Chain Hit: If your attack hits, you may make a free follow-up attack against another target within 3m.
Critical Pierce: Your next attack automatically converts a Solid Hit into a CriticalHit.
Force Rupture: Attack ignores T3 armor completely and inflicts 4d4 damage.
Vital Organ Strike: Inflict a MinorInjury on the Torso/Head location of the target.
Ki Strike of Annihilation: Attack ignores all passive defenses and deals damage equal to 5d8 plus your Fortitude score.
Restore Chi: Restore a minor amount of Chi resource to self.
Deflect Missile: Gain a bonus defense against the next single incoming RangedAttack.
Self-Stance: Grants immunity to Prone and Staggered status effects for 1 round.
AoE Focus: All allies in a 4m radius gain immunity to the Staggered status for 2 rounds.
Project Aura: Grant an adjacent ally a bonus defense against MeleeAttacks for 3 rounds.
Inner Fire: Gain immunity to all T1 environmental effects (e.g., Minor Cold, Minor Heat) for 5 rounds.
Group Deflection: Project an aura that grants 2 selected allies a bonus defense against Ranged Attacks for 3 rounds.
Resilient Will: Grant an ally immunity to the next 2 instances of Composure damage they would suffer.
Eternal Stance: All allies within a 5m radius cannot be forcibly moved or knocked Prone for 4 rounds.
Nausea: Impose a −1 penalty on all target's attack rolls for 1 round.
Weaken Limbs: Target suffers the Hinder status on their arms for 2 rounds.
Pain Block: Target suffers a penalty to all Speed and Agility checks for 2 rounds.
Bio-Toxin Cloud: Create a 3m cloud; enemies suffer 1d4 damage when starting turn in it.
Fatigue Drain: Drain 1d6 points from target's Fatigue pool.
Contagion Carrier: Target must pass a Vitality check or spread their current T1 disease/poison to an adjacent ally.
Rapid Wasting: Inflict a T2 Disease status effect that deals continuous HP damage.
Organ Spasm: Target is Stunned for 2 rounds as their muscles and organs seize violently.
Biological Collapse: Target suffers MajorInjuries to both Arms and both Legs (Contested Vitality check to resist).
Minor Poison: Inflict T1 Poison status effect.
Pain Receptor Spike: Deal 1d6 direct damage that bypasses armor.
Internal Bleed: Inflict a T1 Bleeding status effect that cannot be stabilized by basic First Aid.
Toxic Coating: Enchant your weapon to deal 1d4 bonus poison damage for 3 rounds.
Vicious Poison: Inflict T2 Poison status effect.
Blood Boiling: Deal 3d4 damage directly to the target's HP by rapidly elevating their core temperature.
Vitals Strike: Inflict damage equal to 50% of the target's missing HP as direct damage.
Rapid Degeneration: Target suffers a permanent −1 penalty to their Vitality score for the duration of the encounter.
Full Hemorrhage: Inflict a T3 Bleeding status effect that deals continuous 2d6 damage.
Stabilize: Instantly remove the Bleeding status effect from a target.
Minor Heal: Restore 1d8 HP to a target.
Restore Stamina: Restore a minor amount of Stamina resource to self.
Cure Toxin: Cure the target of any T1 Poison or Disease effect.
Repair Minor Injury: Immediately remove a MinorInjury from a limb.
Rapid Regeneration: Target restores 1d4 HP at the start of their turn for 3 rounds.
Repair Major Injury: Immediately reduce the severity of a MajorInjury to a MinorInjury.
Mass Health: Restore a moderate amount of HP to all allies within 5m.
Full Life Restore: Instantly restore the target's HP to its maximum value and remove all negative status and injury effects.
Ankle Lock: Halve target's movement speed on their next turn.
Hamstring: Target suffers a -2 penalty on their next Agility check.
Crippling Step: Force target to choose between moving or attacking on their next turn (cannot do both).
Binding Field: 3m area. Enemies entering suffer a -2 penalty to their Agility check.
Pinpoint Cage: Immediately move to surround 1 target with up to 3 selected allies, preventing them from moving away.
Mass Restriction: Halve the movement speed of all enemies within 5m for 2 rounds.
Temporal Tether: Target loses their entire next Movement action.
Movement Void: Create a 5m area where all movement costs triple for 2 rounds.
Absolute Stillness: Immobilize one target for 3 rounds (major Chi cost).
Riposte: Successfully evade a melee attack. Deliver a free T1 counter-attack.
Fluid Strike: Your next Dual Knives attack is automatically a Solid Hit.
Evasion Burst: Move through an enemy's threatened area and deal 1d6 damage to them as you pass.
Counter-Stun: Successfully evade an attack. Attacker must pass a Vitality check or be Stunned for 1 round.
Whirlwind Attack: Attack all enemies within 2m of you. Gain a bonus movement action if successful.
Perfect Counter: Successfully evade a Ranged Attack and make a free T2 counter-attack against the attacker.
Graceful Sever: Attack a limb. On a successful strike, the limb immediately suffers a Minor Injury.
Chain Counter: Successfully evade an attack. Make a free T3 counter-attack against two different adjacent enemies.
Flawless Execution: Instantly inflict a Major Injury on a target's arm or leg (major Chi cost, Willpower save to resist).
Quick Step: Move 3m as a bonus action.
Pull Aside: Instantly move an adjacent ally 5m out of an AoE threat.
Shadow Step: Move up to 5m without provoking attacks of opportunity.
Swap Position: Instantly exchange positions with an ally within 10m.
Group Evade: All allies in a 5m area gain +2 defense against AoE effects for 2 rounds.
Mass Dash: All allies gain a bonus to their next Movement roll.
Reposition Team: Select up to 3 allies. Instantly move all selected allies 5m to new locations.
Nullify Attack: Instantly grant an ally immunity to the next 2 instances of Ranged Damage.
Absolute Evasion: Become completely immune to physical damage for 1 round.
Minor Trip: Create a subtle snare on the ground. Next enemy crossing must pass Agility check or be Prone.
Alarm Snare: Create a subtle trip wire that alerts you when triggered.
Illusionary Wall: Create a non-physical 5m wall that prevents enemies from seeing through it (Tactics check to disbelieve).
Explosive Trap: Set a snare that deals 1d6 damage when triggered.
Complex Trap: Create a snare that inflicts the Hinder status on a triggered limb for 2 rounds.
Silent Alarm: Create a sensory trap that only alerts selected allies in a 1km radius.
Mass Confusion: Create a widespread illusion that gives T2 penalties to all enemy perception checks.
Sabotage: Render a complex mechanism (Artifice T2 difficulty or lower) inoperable until repaired (T3 Artifice check).
Absolute Deception: Create a perfect illusionary copy of yourself or an ally that takes 1 hit before vanishing.
Exposed Flank: Deal 1d6 extra damage when attacking a target engaged with an ally.
Feint: Target suffers -2 defense against your next attack.
Trick Shot: Your next Hand Crossbow attack is automatically a Solid Hit.
Critical Opening: Your next Dueling Blade attack is automatically a Critical Hit if the target is Staggered.
Targeted Sever: Attack a limb. On a successful strike, the limb suffers a Minor Injury.
Vicious Bleed: Inflict a T2 Bleeding status effect on the target (cannot be stabilized by basic First Aid).
Chain Reaction: If your attack hits, you may make a free T3 attack against another target within 3m.
Exploit Fracture: Attack treats target's armor as -3 tiers weaker for this strike.
Fatal Blow: Automatically inflict a Major Injury on a target's Torso (major Guile cost, Willpower save to resist).
Conceal Object: Successfully hide a small object on a person or in a scene.
Shadow Step: Move up to 5m and immediately become Concealed.
Mass Distraction: All allies in a 5m radius gain a bonus to their next Slight of Hand or Security check.
Group Concealment: All allies within 5m gain a bonus to their Stealth checks for 3 rounds.
Decoy Aura: The next attack aimed at you is redirected to a nearby non-essential object or ally.
Perfect Shadow: Become completely invisible for 1 round (until you take an offensive action).
Vanishing Act: Successfully disappear from an enemy's line of sight and instantly move up to 15m.
Mass Invisibility: Select up to 3 allies. All become invisible for 1 round.
Absolute Concealment: You become invisible for 3 rounds (until you take an offensive action), suffering no penalties for light/movement.
Slow Reaction: Impose a -1 penalty on target's next Initiative roll.
Lagging Step: Halve target's movement speed on their next two turns.
AP Drain: Target loses their next Action Point (AP), effectively shortening their turn.
Time Distortion: Force an enemy to act last in the initiative order for 2 rounds.
Reverse Movement: Target must move 3m back towards their position from the previous turn.
Turn Skip: Target loses their entire next Minor Action.
Time Lock: Force one enemy to lose their entire next turn (major Tactics cost, Willpower save DC 15 to resist).
Area Stasis: Immobilize all targets in a 4m radius for 1 round.
Chronal Sever: Remove one target from the timeline entirely for 2 rounds (cannot be seen, targeted, or affected).
Minor Rust: Inflict 1d6 damage on a target's armor or object.
Ageing Touch: Inflict 1d8 damage. Target suffers a temporary -1 penalty to Endurance.
Rapid Decay: Destroy a single object (weapon, door) if its material resistance is T2 or lower.
Structure Rot: Inflict 2d6 damage to a target and impose a temporary -1 penalty to all their Defense rolls.
Temporal Fatigue: Drain 1d10 points from target's Fatigue pool.
Object Sever: Destroy an object (weapon, shield) if its material resistance is T3 or lower.
Accelerated Ageing: Deal 3d8 damage to a living target. They suffer a temporary -2 penalty to Vitality for the duration of the encounter.
Instant Collapse: Destroy an object regardless of material resistance (T4 or lower).
Event Echo: Target suffers damage equal to the maximum damage they suffered in the previous 3 rounds.
Foresight: Roll 1 check with Advantage before taking an action.
Minor Repair: Partially reverse the damage done to an object, improving its defense rating by +1.
Reset Step: Instantly move back to the position you occupied at the start of your turn.
Minor Reversal: Reverse the outcome of the 1d4 attacks made against you in the previous round (only affects damage; status effects remain).
Rewind Ally: Restore an ally's HP to the amount it was at the end of the previous round.
Perfect Calculation: Instantly know the highest and lowest possible roll outcome for the next contested roll.
Moment of Chance: Reverse the outcome of the last action taken by yourself or an ally (once per encounter).
Temporal Cache: Draw a specific item (max size Medium) into your hands from your inventory, bypassing the inventory action cost.
Full Reset: Restore all allies' HP, Fatigue, and Composure to their starting amounts (once per campaign).
Wall of Mist: Create a 5m area of fog; penalty on ranged attacks passing through it.
Minor Tremor: Create a small earthquake in a 3m area. Targets must pass an Agility check or be Staggered.
Elemental Snare: 3m area of fire/ice that hinders movement.
Elemental Wall: Create a 5m wall of fire/ice that blocks movement and line of sight.
Gravity Shift: Reduce gravity by 50% in a 5m area, massively boosting jump distance for 2 rounds.
Toxic Fumes: Create a 4m cloud. Targets in it suffer the Nausea status effect.
Mass Quake: Targets in a 6m area must pass a Vitality check or be knocked Prone and Stunned for 1 round.
Absolute Darkness: Plunge a 10m radius into total, magical darkness for 3 rounds.
Elemental Dominance: Instantly control a T3 environmental hazard (e.g., redirect a fire, freeze a river).
Focused Blast: Deal 1d8 single-target elemental damage.
Elemental Cascade: Deal 2d6 damage to all targets in a 4m line.
Elemental Weapon: Enchant your weapon to deal 1d6 extra damage for 3 rounds.
Rune of Projection: Deal 3d6 damage to 1 target.
Elemental Burst: Deal 4d4 AoE damage in a 3m radius.
Penetrating Bolt: Attack ignores T2 armor against a target.
Rune of Destruction: Embed a rune that explodes on your next turn, dealing 5d4 AoE damage.
Environmental Strike: Call down a massive elemental strike (e.g., lightning, meteor) that deals 6d6 damage to a 4m area.
Arcane Annihilation: Deal damage equal to your Knowledge score multiplied by 3 as elemental damage.
Warding: Grant +1 defense to an ally against a specific damage type for 2 rounds.
Elemental Armor: Grant an ally immunity to T1 elemental damage (e.g., Minor Fire).
AoE Defense: All allies in a 5m radius gain +1 defense against Ranged attacks for 1 round.
Energy Dampener: Grant +3 resistance to 1 chosen elemental damage type for 3 rounds.
Aether-Net: Create an invisible energy field that absorbs the next 2 incoming Ranged Attacks directed at you or an ally.
Group Immunity: Grant all allies in a 5m radius immunity to T2 elemental effects for 2 rounds.
Total Warding: Grant immunity to T3 status effects (e.g., Major Poison, Disease) for 3 rounds.
Absolute Deflection: Redirect the next incoming T3 elemental attack at the original caster.
Invulnerability Shell: Grant self or ally complete immunity to all damage and status effects for the duration of the next 2 attacks aimed at them.
Minor Fear: Target 1 enemy. They suffer 1 Composure Damage.
Spectral Shove: Push 1 target 3m using ethereal force.
Sensory Overload: Target suffers a -2 penalty to all Awareness checks for 2 rounds.
Mass Fear: Target all enemies in a 4m radius. Inflict Minor Composure damage.
Spectral Anchor: Compel 1 enemy to remain stationary for 2 rounds (Willpower save DC 12).
Terror Brand: Target suffers a -1 penalty to all actions for 3 rounds due to overwhelming dread.
Group Panic: Inflict Major Composure damage on all enemies in a 5m radius and force them to attempt to Flee.
Mental Domination: Target must perform a single, non-harmful action of your choice on their next turn.
Void Lock: Immobilize 1 target completely for 3 rounds (major Tactics cost, Willpower save DC 18).
Psychic Sting: Deal 1d6 damage to the target's Composure pool.
Ethereal Chill: Inflict 1d8 ethereal damage that bypasses physical armor.
Soul Drain: Deal 2d4 damage to the target's Fatigue pool.
Spirit Bolt: Deal 2d8 ethereal damage.
Mass Chill: Deal 2d6 ethereal damage to all targets in a 3m line.
Composure Breakdown: Deal 3d6 damage to the target's Composure pool.
Soul Rend: Deal massive damage that splits equally between HP and Composure pools.
Spirit Consumption: Drain 50% of the target's current Composure pool.
Essence Sever: Instantly kill a non-essential NPC by severing their spiritual link (major Tactics cost).
Ethereal Scout: Manifest a minor, invisible spirit for 10m scouting (1 Concentration check).
Sense Vulnerability: Identify the lowest defensive stat (Armor or Defense) of 1 target.
Spiritual Light: Grant an adjacent ally a bonus to all Awareness checks for 3 rounds.
Sensory Link: Link your senses to an ally within 20m for 3 rounds, granting them your Awareness score.
Warden Spirit: Summon a spirit that absorbs the next 1 attack aimed at a 3m radius around it.
Fear Dampener: Grant all allies in a 5m radius immunity to T1 Fear effects for 3 rounds.
Group Sight: All allies gain low-light vision for the remainder of the encounter.
Mass Morale: Restore a Major amount of Composure to all allies.
Transcendence: Instantly become immune to all physical damage and Composure loss for 1 round (major Tactics cost).
Distract: Target 1 enemy. Suffer a -1 penalty to all actions for 1 round.
Push Object: Move a small object (max weight 5kg) 3m.
Daze: Target 1 enemy. Impose the Stun status effect for 1 round.
Mental Confusion: Target suffers a -2 penalty to all Willpower checks for 3 rounds.
Unravel Focus: Target immediately loses Focus (L) and cannot use abilities that require concentration for 2 rounds.
Mental Void: Target suffers a Mental Blockade (Guile exhaustion effect) for 1 round.
Brain Lock: Inflict Major Composure damage. If this drops Composure to zero, the target is instantly Immobilized in Fear.
Puppet Master: Gain temporary control of a non-hostile T3 NPC for 1 round.
Mindwipe: Erase the target's memory of the last 5 minutes (major Instinct cost, L save DC 18).
Mental Echo: Deal 1d6 direct Composure damage.
Object Hurl: Deal 1d8 damage by violently throwing a nearby object at the target.
Psychic Drain: Drain 1d8 from the target's Composure pool.
Telekinetic Strike: Deal 2d6 raw physical damage.
Psychic Scream: Deal 3d4 damage to the Composure pools of all targets in a 5m cone.
Targeted Concussion: Deal 4d4 damage. Target must pass a Vitality check or be Stunned.
Overwhelming Force: Telekinetically crush a target, dealing 5d6 damage.
Composure Collapse: Inflict 5 points of Major Composure damage.
Mass Hurl: Throw up to 3 enemies 10m away (Willpower save to remain in place).
Mind Shield: Grant a bonus defense to your next Composure check.
Barrier: Create a temporary shield that absorbs the next 1d4 damage instances.
Group Defense: Grant +1 defense to all allies within 5m for 1 round.
Telekinetic Shield: Create a sustained barrier that absorbs up to 10 total points of damage for 3 rounds.
Psychic Repulsion: Enemies attempting to enter a 3m radius around you suffer Composure damage.
Clarity: Restore a moderate amount of Composure to yourself or an ally and remove the Shaken status.
Projected Will: Transfer your Willpower score as a bonus to an ally's Defense for 2 rounds.
Mass Clarity: Restore a Major amount of Composure to all allies within 10m.
Absolute Barrier: Create an impenetrable shield around yourself for 1 round (major Instinct cost).
Fluster: Target 1 enemy. They suffer a -1 penalty to their next Defense roll.
Draw Gaze: Compel target to only look at you for 1 round.
Vulnerable Posture: Target suffers a -2 penalty to their next Willpower check.
Target Lock: Compel a group of enemies (3m radius) to prioritize a single designated target (Willpower save DC 12).
Mass Confusion: All enemies in a 5m radius suffer a penalty to Awareness checks for 2 rounds.
Opening Attack: Grant the next ally attacking the target a bonus to their attack roll.
Mass Demoralize: Target all enemies in a 6m radius. Inflict Major Composure damage.
Compel Surrender: Force a non-hostile T3 NPC to immediately Surrender (Willpower save DC 15).
Total Loyalty: Instantly turn a hostile NPC of T2 or lower into a temporary ally for the remainder of the encounter.
Distracting Strike: Inflict 1d4 Composure damage.
Exploit Opportunity: Target an enemy. Grant the next ally attacking them a +2 bonus to their attack roll.
Vicious Mockery: Inflict 2d4 damage to the target's Composure pool.
Coordinated Strike: Grant all adjacent allies a bonus damage roll on their next successful attack against that target.
Strategic Opening: Target an enemy. The enemy suffers a -2 penalty to Defense against 2 incoming attacks.
Focus Fire: Grant all allies a +1 bonus to all attack rolls against a single designated target for 3 rounds.
Leadership Momentum: Deliver an attack. If successful, all allies in the encounter instantly regain 2 AP.
Command Strike: Your successful attack also inflicts Major Composure damage on the target.
Rally Strike of Annihilation: Your successful attack allows all allies to make a free T3 attack against the target immediately.
Inspire: Restore a minor amount of Composure to yourself or an adjacent ally.
Remove Shaken: Instantly remove the Shaken status from an ally.
Rallying Cry: Restore a moderate amount of Composure to all allies within 5m.
Unbreakable Morale: Grant all allies immunity to T1 Fear effects for 3 rounds.
Group Resolve: All allies within 10m gain a +2 bonus to all Willpower checks for 2 rounds.
Battlefield Command: Grant up to 3 allies a bonus Minor Action on their next turn.
Mass Clarity: Restore a Major amount of Composure to all allies within 15m.
Immunity Aura: Grant all allies immunity to Composure loss for 2 rounds.
Total Dominance: Grant all allies a temporary +1 increase to their Charm stat for the remainder of the encounter.
Minor Shift: Randomly transform a 1m patch of ground (e.g., ice, mud).
Random Stumble: Inflict a random -1 penalty on one of target's HP Derived Stats (Con, End, Agi, Aware) for 1 round.
Unstable Field: All characters (friend or foe) in a 3m radius suffer a Minor penalty to one randomly determined core stat.
Area Mutate: Randomly transform a 5m section of the battlefield, imposing a T2 penalty on Movement for 2 rounds.
Psychic Feedback: Target must pass a Willpower check or suffer Composure damage equal to the resource cost of their last ability used.
Temporal Flicker: Randomly impose 1 penalty from the Cosmos school (e.g., Lagging Step, Minor Rust) on the target.
Reality Ripple: All non-essential objects in the encounter area (e.g., chairs, crates) are randomly destroyed, moved, or turned into something else.
Mass Instability: All characters in a 10m radius must pass a Willpower check or be Stunned for 1 round.
Full Entropy: Cause Major Injuries to 2 randomly determined limbs on 1 target (major Instinct cost).
Random Blast: Deal 1d8 damage of a randomly determined type.
Unstable Bolt: Deal 2d6 damage. If the damage roll is even, the target suffers the Stagger status; if odd, the caster suffers 1d4 damage.
Chaos Field: Deal 1d10 AoE damage to all targets in a 3m circle.
Volatile Charge: Attack deals damage, and the target must pass a Fortitude save or immediately suffer a T1 Poison or Bleed status (randomly determined).
Unpredictable Nova: Deal 4d6 damage, split randomly between 2 targets.
Unstable Critical: Your next attack automatically converts a Solid Hit into a Critical Hit, but you suffer a random T1 status effect (e.g., Blind, Staggered).
Full Cataclysm: Deal massive damage that is randomly split between HP, Composure, and Fatigue pools of the target.
Paradox Strike: Deal damage equal to your Willpower score multiplied by 4 to a randomly determined target within 15m.
Dimensional Rift: Open a rift that instantly deals 6d6 damage to a 5m area and inflicts 2d6 Composure damage.
Minor Surge: Randomly boost one of your core stats (A-L) by +1 for 1 round.
Resist Random: Gain a bonus resistance against the next 2 instances of T1 random damage or status effects.
Ally Mutation: Target an ally. Randomly grant them a T2-level physical advantage (e.g., hardened skin, temporary speed boost) for 2 rounds.
Self-Morph: Change your body size, shape, or appearance for 5 rounds (granting situational bonuses).
Weapon Mutation: Permanently change your weapon's damage type (e.g., Slashing -> Impact) and grant it +1 damage bonus.
Elemental Randomize: Grant all allies immunity to a T2 elemental damage type (randomly determined) for 3 rounds.
Reality Shift: Instantly change the weather or environmental lighting for the remainder of the encounter.
Full Mutation: Grant yourself 2 randomly determined T3 physical bonuses (e.g., Flight, Regeneration) for 3 rounds.
Absolute Paradox: Immediately reset the Composure pool of all allies to maximum, but suffer a permanent -1 penalty to Willpower (once per session).
